intro.title: A Dark Room
story: You open your eyes.  The room is dark.
As you strain your eyes to see, you think you can see the faint outline of a door.

options.text: Fumble along the walls for a light switch.

lighted-room.title: A Lighted Room
story: After fumbling around the walls, you locate what feels like a light switch and flick it.
Unfortunately, you just flicked the nose of a Zarganian Ipswitch.  They look most aggrieved.

a-new-friend.title: A New Friend
story: The Zarganian Ipswitch accepts your apology graciously.
The two of you strike up a conversation.  After several minutes, you exchange phone numbers, and the Ipswitch guides you through a secret door.
You start going out for drinks a couple times a week.
Many decades later, you lie on your deathbed and the Ipswitch is there.  Tears are in their eyes.  You tell them how much their friendship means to you.  The Ipswitch nods, trying to remain stoic.
As you lose consciousness, you think: This isn't so bad.

outside.title: Uh-Oh
story: As you step through the door, you realize that there isn't actually a floor outside.

lose.title: Ouch.
story: It seems that you have perished in a most agonizing manner.
